ValidationRule.description: Stage must be Awaiting Clarifications, Completed or Cancelled after WIP
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
ISCHANGED(Stage__c) &&
ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Stage__c),"LoE Request Received - WIP") && AND( !ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Awaiting Clarifications"), !ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "LoE Estimate Completed"), !ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Request Cancelled") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Stage must be Awaiting Clarifications, Completed or Cancelled after WIP
